info.title: Scholarship Discovery & Search API
info.description: A comprehensive API for scholarship discovery with advanced search and eligibility checking

get.description: Prometheus metrics endpoint

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token
Simple login endpoint for JSON requests

get.description: Get current user information
Check authentication status

Search scholarships with various filters and pagination support - QA-004 fix: Authentication enforced.
Requires authentication unless PUBLIC_READ_ENDPOINTS feature flag is enabled.

This endpoint allows users to search through available scholarships using
multiple criteria including keywords, fields of study, amount ranges, and more.

Enhanced search with smart suggestions and search quality assessment.

This endpoint provides the same search functionality as the basic search
but includes additional features like search suggestions and metadata.

Get detailed information about a specific scholarship.

Returns comprehensive scholarship details including eligibility criteria,
application requirements, and deadlines.

post.description:
Check if a user profile meets the eligibility criteria for a specific scholarship.

This endpoint evaluates user information against scholarship requirements
and provides detailed feedback on eligibility status.

Check eligibility for multiple scholarships at once.

This endpoint allows users to check their eligibility for multiple
scholarships in a single request, improving efficiency.

schema.title: Response Bulk Eligibility Check Api V1 Scholarships Bulk Eligibility Check Post

post.description:
Get personalized scholarship recommendations based on user profile.

This endpoint uses the user's profile information to generate
tailored scholarship recommendations with eligibility scoring.

get.description:
Get all scholarships offered by a specific organization.

This endpoint returns scholarships filtered by the sponsoring organization.
Get scholarships available for a specific field of study.

post.description:
Search scholarships using POST with request body - QA-005 fix: Authentication enforced
Requires authentication unless PUBLIC_READ_ENDPOINTS feature flag is enabled.

Returns metadata-rich response with items, total, pagination info, and timing.

get.description:
Search scholarships using GET with query parameters - QA-005 fix: Authentication enforced
Requires authentication unless PUBLIC_READ_ENDPOINTS feature flag is enabled.

Returns the same metadata-rich response format as POST endpoint.

post.description:
Search scholarships using POST with request body - QA-005 fix: Authentication enforced
Requires authentication unless PUBLIC_READ_ENDPOINTS feature flag is enabled.

Returns metadata-rich response with items, total, pagination info, and timing.

get.description:
Search scholarships using GET with query parameters - QA-005 fix: Authentication enforced
Requires authentication unless PUBLIC_READ_ENDPOINTS feature flag is enabled.

Returns the same metadata-rich response format as POST endpoint.

post.description:
Check scholarship eligibility using POST with request body.

Enhanced validation with strict input constraints.
Requires authentication in production unless PUBLIC_READ_ENDPOINTS is enabled.

get.description:
Check scholarship eligibility using GET with query parameters.

Enhanced validation requires at least one eligibility parameter.
Requires authentication in production unless PUBLIC_READ_ENDPOINTS is enabled.

post.description:
Check scholarship eligibility using POST with request body.

Enhanced validation with strict input constraints.
Requires authentication in production unless PUBLIC_READ_ENDPOINTS is enabled.

get.description:
Check scholarship eligibility using GET with query parameters.

Enhanced validation requires at least one eligibility parameter.
Requires authentication in production unless PUBLIC_READ_ENDPOINTS is enabled.

Get scholarship recommendations for a user.

Currently returns a feature-disabled response with proper rate limiting.
This endpoint is rate limited to 30 requests per minute per user/IP.

Get analytics summary for the specified time period.

Provides insights into user interactions, search patterns, and
scholarship engagement metrics.

Get analytics for a specific user.

Returns detailed activity history and engagement patterns
for the specified user.

Get recent user interactions with optional filtering.

Returns a list of recent user interactions, optionally filtered
by interaction type (search, view_scholarship, etc.).

Get most popular scholarships based on view count.

Returns scholarships ordered by popularity (view count) within
the specified time period.

Get search trends and patterns.

Analyzes search queries, filters used, and search success rates
to identify trends in user behavior.
Get scholarships directly from PostgreSQL database
Get specific scholarship directly from PostgreSQL database

post.description: Log user interaction directly to PostgreSQL database

get.description: Get analytics summary directly from PostgreSQL database
Get popular scholarships directly from PostgreSQL database
Check database connection and basic statistics (no authentication required for health check)
Kubernetes/deployment-style health check endpoint - minimal dependencies

head.description: Kubernetes/deployment-style health check endpoint - minimal dependencies

get.description:
Readiness probe - checks if the application is ready to serve requests
Checks database connectivity and other dependencies

Database connectivity health check with Replit-specific handling
Uses short timeout and graceful fallback for SQLite in dev

Comprehensive services health check for Replit deployment
Checks all external dependencies with graceful fallbacks
Development-only debug endpoint showing sanitized runtime configuration

post.description:
Enhance a search query using AI to improve search results.

This endpoint uses AI to:
- Improve search terms for better matching
- Suggest relevant filters
- Identify search intent
- Provide confidence score

get.description:
Get AI-powered search suggestions based on partial query.

Returns intelligent suggestions to help users find relevant scholarships.

post.description:
Analyze how well a user profile matches scholarship eligibility using AI.

Provides detailed analysis and recommendations for scholarship applications.

get.description:
Generate an AI-powered summary of a scholarship.

Creates a concise, student-friendly summary highlighting key information.

Get AI-powered analysis of scholarship trends and insights.

Analyzes current scholarship offerings to identify patterns and provide insights.

Check the status of AI-powered features.

Returns information about AI service availability and capabilities.
Get database status - root endpoint
Get database status - API v1 endpoint

post.description:
Receive and execute task from Command Center

Accepts task envelope, validates JWT authentication, and executes asynchronously.
Returns 202 immediately and processes task in background.

schema.title: Response Receive Task Agent Task Post

post.description:
Handle registration request from Command Center

Validates JWT and returns agent capabilities and health status.

schema.title: Response Register Agent Agent Register Post

get.description:
Return agent capabilities and status

Public endpoint showing supported actions and agent health.

Agent health check with orchestrator context

Returns health status including agent ID and orchestrator connectivity.

schema.title: Response Agent Health Agent Health Get

post.description:
Accept internal events and relay to Command Center

Optional endpoint for receiving internal events that should be
forwarded to the Command Center event bus.

Log multiple interaction events with strict input validation
Requires authentication unless PUBLIC_READ_ENDPOINTS is enabled
